item.title: Onboarding
item.description: An important part of a SaaS application, especially one that requires integrations to provide any measure of benefit, is onboarding. For me, the advantages are simple. Generally, CX needs to be smooth [quick and useful]. It is also important to know at what stage a trialer is at. This can then be aided by a digital campaign with support. With most onboarding models requiring a starting point outside of our product, e.
